hero.title: Create Your Spooky Halloween Park
hero.description: Are you ready to run your own Halloween park? My Halloween Park is a 3D simulation game that lets you create a spooky and fun amusement park for visitors. You can collect ghosts and load them into the haunted house, where visitors will pay you to enter and experience the horror.

sections.attractionsDescription: Experience various haunted environments from ghost-filled mansions to pumpkin gardens and candy shops.
sections.halloweenSpiritText: My Halloween Park captures the essence of Halloween with its spooky atmosphere, ghostly inhabitants, and festive attractions. From collecting spirits to managing haunted houses, every aspect of the game immerses you in the magical world of Halloween.
sections.halloweenSpiritText2: Create the most terrifying and profitable Halloween park while maintaining the perfect balance between scares and fun. Your visitors will love the unique experience you provide!

reviews.name: Alex Johnson
reviews.text: Amazing Halloween game! The ghost collection mechanic is incredibly fun and the haunted house management is addictive. I've been playing for hours creating the spookiest park possible!

reviews.name: Sarah Chen
reviews.text: Perfect for Halloween lovers! The pumpkin patches and candy shops are so cute, and the ghost trains are thrilling. Love how each attraction feels unique with different ghost types.

reviews.name: Mike Rodriguez
reviews.text: Best Halloween park simulator I've played! The 3D graphics are impressive and the management aspects are well-balanced. Highly recommend for anyone who loves spooky themes!

reviews.name: Emma Wilson
reviews.text: Great game for both casual and hardcore players. The progression system keeps me engaged and the seasonal events add fun strategic elements. Love the ghost-carrying mechanics!

reviews.name: David Kim
reviews.text: Incredible attention to detail in the haunted attractions. The different ghost types really change how you need to approach each haunted house design.

reviews.name: Lisa Thompson
reviews.text: Addictive gameplay with smooth performance. The park variety keeps things fresh and the Halloween atmosphere is perfectly captured. Excellent spooky fun!

gameUpdates.title: New Ghost Types Released
gameUpdates.description: Experience terrifying new ghost varieties that bring unique scares to your haunted houses. Each ghost type has special abilities and scaring patterns.
gameUpdates.fullContent: We're excited to announce the release of our new ghost collection system! This major update introduces five new ghost types with unique abilities and scaring patterns. Poltergeists can move objects, Shadow Spirits create darkness effects, Wailing Ghosts produce spine-chilling sounds, Phantom Guards patrol specific areas, and Trickster Spirits play pranks on visitors. Each ghost type affects visitor experience differently, requiring strategic placement in your haunted houses. New ghost-specific missions have also been added to test your ghost management skills.

gameUpdates.title: Pumpkin Festival Event
gameUpdates.description: Celebrate the harvest season with our new Pumpkin Festival event featuring special decorations, limited-time attractions, and exclusive rewards.
gameUpdates.fullContent: This update introduces our first seasonal event - the Pumpkin Festival! For two weeks, players can participate in special pumpkin-growing challenges, unlock festival-exclusive decorations, and earn unique rewards. The event includes new pumpkin varieties, special lighting effects, and festival-themed attractions that boost visitor satisfaction. Limited-time ghost types that only appear during the festival will also be available. The update also includes performance improvements and bug fixes for smoother gameplay across all devices.

gameUpdates.title: Haunted House Designer Tool
gameUpdates.description: Introducing a powerful new tool that lets you design custom haunted house layouts with advanced room placement and decoration options.
gameUpdates.fullContent: We've launched our comprehensive Haunted House Designer tool! This revolutionary feature allows players to create custom haunted house layouts with unprecedented detail. Choose from hundreds of room types, place decorations strategically, and design scare sequences that maximize visitor fright. The tool includes advanced features like scare timing, visitor path optimization, and atmospheric effects. Pre-designed haunted house templates are also available for players who prefer to start with proven layouts. This update also includes new decoration sets and improved ghost AI for more realistic behavior.

trailDiaries.title: Behind the Scenes: Ghost Design Process
trailDiaries.description: Take a look at how we design and create the terrifying ghosts that populate your haunted attractions.
trailDiaries.fullContent: Creating the ghost characters for My Halloween Park involves a fascinating blend of folklore research and creative design. Our design team studies ghost legends from around the world to create authentic and diverse spirit types. Each ghost goes through multiple design iterations where we balance visual appeal with gameplay mechanics. The Poltergeist design took over two months to perfect, with countless adjustments to its object-moving animations and scare patterns. We also work closely with our sound design team to create unique ghost sounds that enhance the spooky atmosphere. The result is a diverse ghost population that makes each haunted house feel unique and terrifying.

trailDiaries.title: Community Spotlight: Top Park Managers
trailDiaries.description: Meet some of the most successful park managers in our community and learn their strategies for creating profitable Halloween parks.
trailDiaries.fullContent: This month we're highlighting three exceptional park managers who have mastered the art of Halloween park management. SpookyMaster has created the most profitable haunted house chain, achieving record visitor numbers and revenue. PumpkinQueen has revolutionized pumpkin patch management, creating the most beautiful and productive gardens in the game. And GhostWhisperer has collected the rarest ghost types and created the most terrifying haunted attractions. We interviewed each player about their management strategies, favorite attractions, and tips for new players. Their insights have been invaluable in helping us understand what makes our game so engaging and how we can continue to improve the player experience.

trailDiaries.title: Development Update: Future Features
trailDiaries.description: Get a sneak peek at upcoming features and improvements planned for My Halloween Park in the coming months.
trailDiaries.fullContent: We're excited to share our development roadmap for the next six months! Q1 2025 will bring a comprehensive multiplayer system allowing players to visit and rate each other's parks. We're also working on a seasonal events system with Halloween, Christmas, and other holiday-themed content. Q2 will introduce a story mode with narrative-driven missions and character progression. The story will follow a rookie park manager's journey to becoming a Halloween park legend. We're also planning major visual upgrades including improved lighting systems, particle effects for ghost interactions, and more detailed attraction models. Community feedback has been crucial in shaping these features, and we can't wait to see how players respond to these new additions.
